snippet: The number of Baltimore businesses known to have been damaged by riots and looting last week has reached about 300, state officials said Thursday.
abstract: Maryland officials say roughly 300 Baltimore businesses have been damaged by riots and looting in past week; businesses will have chance to apply for no-interest loans of up to $35,000 under Baltimore Business Recovery Loan Program.
lead_paragraph: The number of Baltimore businesses known to have been damaged by riots and looting last week has reached about 300, state officials said Thursday.
